name: U&I Trust
briefDescription: U&I is a volunteer-driven charity committed to driving change in education, child and women welfare, and mental health. Our education initiative, U&I Teach is an after-school tutoring service through which we coach underprivileged children at Learning Centers across the country. Our rehab initiative U&I Care impacts special-needs boys and men by providing therapy, social interaction and vocational training. We also provide vocational training to trafficked women at a Shelter in Bangalore.As of today, U&I impacts more than 1200 men, women and children directly on a daily basis.
